entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who is talking to his aunt and uncle.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that guard the wizard prison Azkaban. They are mentioned by Harry as being responsible for something.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a wizard prison where dementors guard it. It was mentioned by Aunt Petunia as the place where dementors are located.

relationships.description: Dementors guard Azkaban, which is a location mentioned by Aunt Petunia. Harry mentions that dementors are responsible for something.
Aunt Petunia knows about Azkaban and its connection to dementors, which implies that she has some knowledge or experience with the place.
